title: Do you have your own gravitational pull? - Quora

response.answer_text: After so many months without the gym, eating too much, and drowning my sorrows in beer you would think so - but no, not noticeable compared to that of the earth. Gravity is very weak, it takes a large mass for it to be noticeable. And, dispute appearances, I have not acquired that much mass yet.

Everything with mass has a gravitational ‘pull’. I read once in a discussion on Astrology that the doctor and nurses in a delivery room have far more gravitational ‘pull’ than any astronomical object! Realistically, people are not born under the sign of Taurus, but under the sign of Nurse Jones!
